mapper.select: select tbnlffc.field_id as fieldId,tbnlffc.field_name as fieldName,tbnlffc.field_perm as perm from t_bpmn_node_lf_formdata_field_control tbnlffc inner join (select tbvs.node_id from t_bpm_variable tbv left join t_bpm_variable_single tbvs on tbvs.variable_id=tbv.id where tbv.process_num=#{processNum} and tbvs.element_id=#{elementId} union all select tbvm.node_id from t_bpm_variable tbv left join t_bpm_variable_multiplayer tbvm on tbvm.variable_id=tbv.id where tbv.process_num=#{processNum} and tbvm.element_id=#{elementId})tmp on tbnlffc.node_id=tmp.node_id
